name: relativistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to relativism (= the belief that truth and right and wrong can only be judged in relation to other things and that nothing can be true or right in all situations): To my mind, these kind of questions always need to be considered relativistically. Relativistically speaking, we just can't be confident about the conclusions.
More examplesFewer examplesBecause no absolute standards existed in this area, they had to be derived relativistically.She made it clear that she was speaking personally and relativistically by introducing each statement with a phrase like "for me" or "in my view".
